verses.name: Luke 15:29
verses.text: And he answering said to his father, Lo, these many years do I serve thee, neither transgressed I at any time thy commandment: and yet thou never gavest me a kid, that I might make merry with my friends:

verses.name: Luke 15:30
verses.text: But as soon as this thy son was come, which hath devoured thy living with harlots, thou hast killed for him the fatted calf.

verses.name: Luke 15:31
verses.text: And he said unto him, Son, thou art ever with me, and all that I have is thine.
